data.oai_dc:dc: This file essentially contains the weather data recorded by Met Station #40 (Deep Well Site, Lat. 34.3556, Long. -106.6914) which was the only Met Station operating on the Sevilleta Wildlife area during this year. Note that precipitation data collection was initiated on 4 February (see change log) and no data on solar radiation, soil moisture, or vapor pressure were collected during this year.
